org.fxyz3d.shapes.primitives.helper

Class InterpolateBezier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fxyz3d.shapes.primitives.helper.InterpolateBezier

  • public class InterpolateBezier
extends java.lang.Object
    Given N 3D points (knots), N-1 Bezier cubic curves will be generated, passing through these knots, by adding 2(N-1) control points Conditions if spline is open: - C2 in all the inner knots (2 ecuations x N-2 knots) - On external knots r''=0 (2 ecuations) Conditions if spline is closed (knot[0]==knot[N]: - C2 in all the inner knots (2 ecuations x N-2 knots) Tridiagonal linear system - Thomas algorithm See: http://www.particleincell.com/blog/2012/bezier-splines/
